channel.title: Jail help plz

EDIT: can somebody please tell me how to delete an object like the table in skillingzone

item.title: Jail help plz
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Unjail command:

			if(playerCommand.startsWith("unjail")) {
				try {
					String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(7);
					for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
					if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
					c2.teleportToX = 3086;
                    c2.teleportToY = 3493;
					c2.Jail = false;
					c2.sendMessage("You have been unjailed by "+c.playerName+".");
					c.sendMessage("Successfully unjailed "+c2.playerName+".");
							} 
						}
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline.");
				}
			}
        
    }

item.title: Jail help plz
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Add this command:


			if(playerCommand.startsWith("jail")) {
				try {
					String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(5);
					for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
					if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
					c2.teleportToX = 3102;
					c2.teleportToY = 9516;
					c2.Jail = true;
					c2.sendMessage("You have been jailed by "+c.playerName+"");
					c.sendMessage("Successfully Jailed "+c2.playerName+".");
							} 
						}
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline.");
				}
			}

[hr]
Now in your PlayerSave class, add:

} else if (token.equals("Jailed")) { p.Jail = Boolean.parseBoolean(token2);
And add this as well:

			characterfile.write("Jailed = ", 0, 9);
			characterfile.write(Boolean.toString(p.Jail), 0, Boolean.toString(p.Jail).length());
			characterfile.newLine();

[hr]
In your Player.java add this:

	Jail = false,

Now look for inWild [still in Player.java] and under that code snippet, add:


	public boolean isInJail() {		
		if(absX >= 3093 && absX <= 3112 && absY >= 9507 && absY <= 9526) {
			return true;
		}
		return false;
	}

[hr]
Now in your PlayerAssistant class, look for spellTeleport and add:

		if(c.Jail == true) {
			c.sendMessage("You can't teleport out of jail...");
			return;
		}
		if(c.inJail() && c.Jail == true) {
			c.sendMessage("You can't teleport out of jail...");
			return;
		}

And that should do it, tell me how it works.

Read full topic
